name: Check if user is created when only optional fields are entered with valid data

steps.name: Given  Admin should click "+ A New User"
When  Admin skips mandatory fields in the form and clicks on the submit button from  "User" 1
Then  Admin should see an error message below the fields and the fields will be highlighted in red color
